file.name: net-mk1-hub-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: YagnaNet Hub
  description: Centralized hub for YagnaNet MK1
  version: 0.1.0
servers:
  - url: /net-api/v0.1
    description: relative path to the net API
tags:
- name: auth
  description: Hub authentication
- name: message
  description: Hub message operations
paths:
  /auth:
    post:
      tags:
      - auth
      summary: Authenticate within the hub
      operationId: authenticate
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/JWT'
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
      security:
      - bearerAuth: []
    delete:
      tags:
      - auth
      summary: Deactivate the authorization token within the hub
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        405:
          description: Invalid input
          content: {}
      security:
      - bearerAuth: []
  /message:
    post:
      tags:
      - message
      summary: Send a message
      operationId: send
      requestBody:
        description: Network message to send
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Message'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        405:
          description: Invalid input
          content: {}
      security:
      - bearerAuth: []
    get:
      tags:
      - message
      summary: Receive a message
      operationId: poll
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Message'
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
      security:
      - bearerAuth: []
components:
  schemas:
    JWT:
      type: string
    Message:
      type: object
      properties:
        requestId:
          type: string
          example: 11c47c94-ed06-44cb-b1f2-e26b7c943489
        destination:
          type: string
          description: Destination address
          example: 0x123/market-api/get-offers
        payload:
          type: string
          description: Binary data (base64)
          example: ZXhhbXBsZQ==
      required:
        - requestId
        - destination
        - payload
      xml:
        name: Message
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
